rows.label: qst630102_msg0001
rows.name: Brought the stuff, did you?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0002
rows.name:
Then I'll put that accessory
together for you lickety-split!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0003
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: qst630102_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, let me think. What was it
I was going to make again...?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, hmm... I feel like I
sort of remember... But then
again, I sort of don't...

rows.label: qst630102_msg0006
rows.name: Could you jog my memory a little?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0007
rows.name: What was Silvio trying to make?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0008
rows.name: The greatest accessory in all Alst!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0009
rows.name: You were a bit hazy on the details.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0101
rows.name:
The greatest accessory...in
all of Alst, you say?!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, I'll be... Was I really trying
to create a thing like that?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0103
rows.name:
That does sound like something I might
come up with... But no, I'm sure I'd
remember if I had an idea like that.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0104
rows.name:
I think I know what's going on here.
You just said the first thing that
came into your heads, didn't you?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0201
rows.name:
So you don't remember either, eh?
Well, at least you're honest.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0202
rows.name: What's that? I never actually told you?

rows.label: qst630102_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, isn't this a fine pickle? These
fine materials aren't much use if I
don't know what to make with them!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0301
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]W-wait a minute!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0302
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]I just had the perfect idea!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0303
rows.name:
I'll let you decide what kind of
accessory you want me to make
from the materials you've got!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0304
rows.name:
Yes, that's a fine idea. I just like
making things, it doesn't really matter
what. So I'm open to requests!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0305
rows.name:
Yes, that's the ticket. Just
come see me whenever you like.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0306
rows.name:
As long as you've got the materials,
I'll make whatever you fancy!

rows.label: qst630102_msg0307
rows.name:
Now, the materials I need
are a Jungle Frame, a Pione
Stone, and a Volff Fang.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0308
rows.name:
Jungle Frames are mostly found in
Gula, I hear. You find them when
salvaging from time to time.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0309
rows.name:
And you shouldn't have any trouble
finding Pione Stones if you check
the rocky corners of Invidia.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0310
rows.name:
As for the Volff Fang, you can
get one by defeating Rip Volff
around Drillbore Bridge.

rows.label: qst630102_msg0311
rows.name:
I'll wait here for as long as
it takes you. Well, or till I
die. Nobody lives forever!
